name: oracle-jet-preact-ts-webpack-redux-styled-component
description: An Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit(JET) web app

scripts.preinstall: zsh -c "source ~/.zshrc; nvm use 14; cd micro-frontend-shared; yarn; cd -; cd micro-frontend-app-1; yarn; cd -; cd micro-frontend-container; yarn; cd -; "
scripts.start: zsh -c "source ~/.zshrc; nvm use 14; (cd micro-frontend-app-1; yarn start; cd -; ) & (cd micro-frontend-container; yarn start; cd -) & "
scripts.build: zsh -c "source ~/.zshrc; nvm use 14; (cd micro-frontend-app-1; yarn build; cd -; ) & ; (cd micro-frontend-container; yarn build; cd -) & "
